document_data.name: Kaummorth
document_data.mainbody: '''Kaummorth''' was a figure known to the [[Zhentarim]] of the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Legacy: Two [[Zhentarim]] [[mages]], [[Hlael Toraunt]] and [[Korthauvar Hammantle]] discussed Kaummorth while procrastinating on some work for [[Drauthtar Inskirl]]. He had made a speech whose gist, per Hlael, was akin to "Smile and walk softly and be greatly feared", emphasizing intimidation over violence.
